description:
Search and browse videos, channels, and playlists to fetch titles, descriptions, stats, and durations.

Retrieve multilingual, timestamped transcripts and search within captions for precise context.

Surface channel and playlist insights quickly by listing items and details.

youtubeApiKey.description: Your YouTube Data API v3 key. Required for all operations. Can also be provided via YOUTUBE_API_KEY environment variable.

youtubeTranscriptLang.description: Default language code for YouTube transcripts (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr', 'de')
